gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 17,5]]The apostles said to the Lord, "Increase our faith."
[[Lc 17,6]]The Lord replied, "If you have faith the size of a mustard seed, you would say to (this) mulberry tree, 'Be uprooted and planted in the sea,' and it would obey you.
[[Lc 17,7]]Who among you would say to your servant who has just come in from plowing or tending sheep in the field, 'Come here immediately and take your place at table'?
[[Lc 17,8]]Would he not rather say to him, 'Prepare something for me to eat. Put on your apron and wait on me while I eat and drink. You may eat and drink when I am finished'?
[[Lc 17,9]]Is he grateful to that servant because he did what was commanded?
[[Lc 17,10]]So should it be with you. When you have done all you have been commanded, say, 'We are unprofitable servants; we have done what we were obliged to do.'"

first_reading.title: Book of Habakkuk
first_reading.text:
[[Ha 1,2]]How long, O LORD? I cry for help but you do not listen! I cry out to you, "Violence!" but you do not intervene.
[[Ha 1,3]]Why do you let me see ruin; why must I look at misery? Destruction and violence are before me; there is strife, and clamorous discord.
[[Ha 2,2]]Then the LORD answered me and said: Write down the vision Clearly upon the tablets, so that one can read it readily.
[[Ha 2,3]]For the vision still has its time, presses on to fulfillment, and will not disappoint; If it delays, wait for it, it will surely come, it will not be late.
[[Ha 2,4]]The rash man has no integrity; but the just man, because of his faith, shall live.

second_reading.text:
[[2_Tm 1,6]]Beloved: I remind you to stir into flame the gift of God that you have through the imposition of my hands.
[[2_Tm 1,7]]For God did not give us a spirit of cowardice but rather of power and love and self-control.
[[2_Tm 1,8]]So do not be ashamed of your testimony to our Lord, nor of me, a prisoner for his sake; but bear your share of hardship for the gospel with the strength that comes from God.
[[2_Tm 1,13]]Take as your norm the sound words that you heard from me, in the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus.
[[2_Tm 1,14]]Guard this rich trust with the help of the holy Spirit that dwells within us.
